The humor in this meme is derived from the play on words and the juxtaposition of two contrasting concepts both linked to the month of November.

The top part of the meme references "No Nut November," an internet challenge that encourages participants to refrain from ejaculating for the entire month of November. This part of the meme features an anime character with a shocked and flustered expression, which comically underscores the challenge's theme of abstention.

The bottom part of the meme twists the above concept into "Nonstop Nhentai November," a mock challenge that suggests indulging without restraint in adult manga (hentai), with "Nhentai" being a reference to a website known for such content. Here, the anime character is depicted with a suggestive and overly enthusiastic expression, which serves to humorously contrast the self-control implied by "No Nut November."

The meme's humor is based on the expectation that the two concepts will be similar in theme but they turn out to be diametrically opposed. The shock value, the use of anime character expressions to visually communicate the concepts, and the playfulness of creating a mock counterpart to a well-known internet challenge all contribute to the comedic effect. Additionally, the meme can be seen as a commentary on internet culture and its various monthly challenges, often taken to humorous extremes.
